Metadata: A guide for Bayesian analysis in AD model builder
Available both as hard copy and on web. To keep up with updates to the manual, link to website.

The goal of this guide is to outline and describe the steps needed to conduct a Bayesian analysis in AD Model Builder. Included are general descriptions of Bayesian inference, priors, work how and two built-in MCMC algorithms. We hope that the guide will enable users to take full advantage of the features of ADMB that are built-in, but not well-â€‹documented.
